channel.title: Your views on pirating games
channel.description:
:pirate: So, in light of my recent pirating of WC3: FT, I've wondered how others think of this. I have pirated a lot of games. A LOT. Mostly games I play on an emulator cause you cant find em on store shelves anymore. This one's the least newest game I've pirated, which makes me ashamed of myself.
I only did it for Dota, so yeah.[/SIZE]
So how do you guys feel about pirating old games that are hard to find? :pirate:

So, in light of my recent pirating of WC3: FT, I’ve wondered how others think of this. I have pirated a lot of games. A LOT. Mostly games I play on an emulator cause you cant find em on store shelves anymore. This one’s the least newest game I’ve pirated, which makes me ashamed of myself.
